featured.text: If this works, huge numbers of elderly and disabled people can regain their personal mobility.
The elderly will become more mobile.
Elderly shoppers in this store are advised to take the elevator rather than the _____, which may move too fast for them to keep their balance.
Some—especially the elderly and those with weak immune systems—die.
Many have been helped through the scheme, including single parents, disabled people and the elderly, and those who have lost all their household possessions through a disaster such as a house fire.

definition.zh_def: 年長的，通常指年齡較大的人，特別是老年人。
definition.en_def: Referring to people who are advanced in age, typically older adults.
definition.example: The elderly often require special care and attention.
